definition: China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2

sentences.english: Later she went to work for China Central Television Station, presenting two variety shows.
sentences.chinese: 接着她又在中央电视台工作，主持两档综艺节目。

sentences.english: CCTV reporter Zhang Nini finds out how the public is coping with the change.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台记者张妮妮了解了公众对这一变化的反应。

sentences.english: It is Billie Piper in 1984 China Central Television TV series.
sentences.chinese: 那是一九八四年中央电视台筹拍电视连续剧。

sentences.english: Yes. I'm watching " Cartoon City " on CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我在看中央电视台的“动画城”。

sentences.english: Zhen-Ao Company is still advertising its "nucleic acid nutrition" products on CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 珍奥公司还在中央电视台做其“核酸营养品”的广告。

sentences.english: Hallam, which TV channel do you want to watch?
sentences.chinese: 我在看中央电视台的百家讲坛。
我在看中央电视台的百家讲坛。

sentences.english: Health and the former Central Television News Department deputy chief.
sentences.chinese: 生前任中央电视台新闻编辑部副科长。

sentences.english: The two sets of lightest rack EFP systems of CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台的两套最轻量的箱载EFP系统。

sentences.english: There is a great variety-show on CCTV at 8.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台8点有很棒的综艺节目。

sentences.english: The new CCTV building is an extravaganza of strange look.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台的新大楼是一件外貌新奇的奇特作品。

sentences.english: Were you at home watching TV last night?
sentences.chinese: 我在看中央电视台的百家讲坛。

sentences.english: Zhang Bin is an anchor for CCTV sports program.
sentences.chinese: 张斌是中央电视台体育节目的主持人。

sentences.english: talking to Li Weiyin,a journalist from the CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 正和中央电视台的记者李魏音谈话。

sentences.english: The comperes of CCTV join up to play these advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台的主持人联合起来表演这些广告。

sentences.english: CCTV new main building comes on stage with glittering appearance in attracting the attention of millions of people.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台新主楼在万众瞩目中闪亮登场了。
